houses.title: Super Lux apartment
houses.description: Apartment in a two-storey house on an asphalt street of 12 meters in Deir, near Abu Arif Street. The house is on the edge of the land, and the rest of the area is cultivated, at a price of 529 dinars

houses.title: Kushan Tabu
houses.description: A villa on Salah El-Din Street in Gaza, the house is on the edge of the land, and the rest of the area is cultivated, at a price of 1052 dinars.

houses.title: Apartment for sale

houses.title: Bone villa
houses.description: Villa in Al-Jeneina neighborhood for sale, land area 500 m, building area 320 m, it has a landmark and a main street, it has a ready water well, two separate entrances, a building designed according to the insulation system

houses.title: Ready to move
houses.description: Ready-to-move-in apartment with balcony overlooking Al-Aam Street

houses.title: Classic villa
houses.description: Ground floor: living room, kitchen, storeroom, master bedroom with cloakroom and utility store - council room and dining room with two balconies, one on the kitchen and the other at the front of the house - internal staircase. First floor: master bedroom - two other bedrooms - large terrace

houses.title: Villa Gala for daily rent
houses.description: A distinctive villa consisting of two floors, with American furniture, a private garden, a quiet atmosphere, and a stunning view
